reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major subcategories: urinary incontinence (~2500 per 100k), dysuria/urinary tract disorders (~2000 per 100k), BPH-related symptoms (~1500 per 100k), urinary retention and other forms (~500 per 100k). Total ~6500 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneous conditions with overlapping definitions and significant geographic variation.
